executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Referencing docs/project_plan.md. Target: http://localhost:3001.
Test Scenarios (Required):
1. Game Start: Click 'Start Game' -> Game starts, BGM plays (check audio element or state).
2. Block Movement: Arrow actions (Left, Right, Down) -> Block moves without delay.
3. Rotation System: Spacebar/Up Arrow -> Block rotates. Verify Wall Kick.
4. Line Clear: Fill a row -> Line clears, Score increases.
5. Game Over: Stack blocks to top -> 'Game Over' modal appears.
6. Visual Check: Verify 'Obangsaek' colors and background.
IMPORTANT: The server is running on PORT 3001. Ensure all Playwright/Puppeteer navigations go to http://localhost:3001.
